Name: HB Retail incl CA
Expression: {UNION(     {TM1FILTERBYLEVEL( {TM1DRILLDOWNMEMBER( {TM1FILTERBYPATTERN( {TM1SUBSETALL( [Locations] )}, "HB RETAIL")}, ALL, RECURSIVE )}, 0)},     {TM1FILTERBYLEVEL( {TM1DRILLDOWNMEMBER( {TM1FILTERBYPATTERN( {TM1SUBSETALL( [Locations] )}, "HBH California LLC")}, ALL, RECURSIVE )}, 0)})}
